pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, EmptySquare, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Piece is the abstract class for the Chess game, in general it specifies the Piece object and the functionality of that Piece object.
    Author:
    Deep Kotadia, Chinmoyi Bhushan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece(java.lang.String value)
      defined constructor for Piece class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getvalue()
      getValue gets the value of the piece
      boolean hasMoved()
      hasMoved is a function to check if the Piece has moved or not
      boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isMoveValid function to check if the Piece can move from one pos to another, it is extended to the subclasses to check for the valid move of that particular Piece.
      boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isPathEmpty function to check if the path b/w the src and dest is empty, it is extended by the subclasses to check their own paths.
      void move(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos, char promopiece)
      move function to move the Piece from one pos to another, it is overriden by subclasses to implement their own moves.
      void sethasMoved(boolean hasMoved)
      sethasMoved is a function that acts as a flag for if the piece has moved.

    • Method Detail

      • getvalue

        public java.lang.String getvalue()
        getValue gets the value of the piece
        Returns:
        the value of the piece.

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved()
        hasMoved is a function to check if the Piece has moved or not
        Returns:
        true or false depending upon if the piece has moved

      • sethasMoved

        public void sethasMoved(boolean hasMoved)
        sethasMoved is a function that acts as a flag for if the piece has moved.
        Parameters:
        hasMoved - it is a boolean that is passed in to see if the piece has moved.

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String oldPos,
                 java.lang.String newPos,
                 char promopiece)
        move function to move the Piece from one pos to another, it is overriden by subclasses to implement their own moves.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - old position
        newPos - new position
        promopiece - required in Pawn's case.

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        isMoveValid function to check if the Piece can move from one pos to another, it is extended to the subclasses to check for the valid move of that particular Piece.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - old position
        newPos - new position
        Returns:
        true if valid and false otherwise.

      • isPathEmpty

        public boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        isPathEmpty function to check if the path b/w the src and dest is empty, it is extended by the subclasses to check their own paths.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - old position
        newPos - new position
        Returns:
        true if path empty and false otherwise
